## useEnsureTrackReference (hook)

Ensures that a track reference is provided, either via context or explicitly as a parameter. If not inside a `TrackContext` and no track reference is provided, an error is thrown.

### Import

```typescript
import { useEnsureTrackReference } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                  | Description  |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| track     | [TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder](./core//components-core.trackreferenceorplaceholder.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder](./core//components-core.trackreferenceorplaceholder.md)
